name: Meet Up
about: MeetUp is an intuitive online meeting application designed for seamless virtual communication. Whether it's for team collaborations, webinars, or personal catch-ups, MeetUp provides a reliable platform with high-quality video and audio features. With easy scheduling, screen sharing, and real-time messaging, MeetUp ensures that you can connect and communicate effortlessly from anywhere in the world.

name: Trade Wizard
about: Trade Wizard provides an intuitive platform with real-time stock data, daily market updates, and comprehensive historical information for each stock. Using powerful APIs for seamless data integration, this app is designed for both investors and enthusiasts, offering an easy-to-use interface to explore, track, and analyze stocks with ease.

name: Fitness Freak
about: Welcome to Fitness Freak. Dive into a sleek interface designed for seamless navigation and user-friendly experience. Explore a variety of activities including yoga, gym workouts, and more. Engage with fellow fitness enthusiasts in our global chat feature, fostering connections and motivation.

name: Make A Mine
about: Make A Mine is a dynamic digital marketing startup that specializes in providing high-quality services such as SEO, deployment, and more. With a proven track record of success, they hired me to build their portfolio website, creating a sleek and user-friendly platform that highlights their expertise and showcases their impactful work in the digital marketing space.

name: WebChat
about: WebChat is a real-time messaging platform built with a focus on performance and scalability. It supports instant communication, message persistence, and reliable delivery using Kafka and Express-based backend architecture. The system is designed for cross-platform compatibility with a Flutter and Dart-powered frontend.

name: Whisper
about: Whisper is a full-stack platform that blends professional networking, anonymous discussion, and real-time communication. Inspired by Discord, LinkedIn, and Fishbowl, it supports private messaging, public channels, anonymous forums, and profile-based networking â€” all in one place. Designed for scale with a distributed architecture and a modern, intuitive UI.

name: System Library
about: System Library is a project I developed as a JavaScript-based clone of Windows Explorer using Electron. I focused on recreating the classic interface, ensuring smooth file navigation, and optimizing performance for a seamless desktop experience.
